product_name: FENTY BEAUTY by RihannaKillawatt Freestyle Highlighter
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeThe FENTY BEAUTY by Rihanna Killawatt Foil Freestyle Highlighter is a lightweight, longwear cream-powder hybrid highlighter that ranges from subtle dayglow to insanely supercharged in solos and expertly paired duos.
details: DetailsBenefitsCream to powder formula that instantly melts into skin and blends with almost zero effortRanges from subtle dayglow to insanely supercharged with shades that were designed for all skin tonesLoaded with superfine shimmer for an ultra-smooth, creamy textureLongwearFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensItem 2592606How To UseUse the Cheek-Hugging Highlight Brush 120 (sold separately) to apply onto cheekbones. The brush's asymmetrical shark-tooth shape, you can highlight with more edge and precision.Use the fatter side to supercharge cheeks, the leaner side to low-key luminize your nose and chin, and the precision tip to brighten eyes and your cupid's bow.IngredientsDimethicone, Talc, Isododecane, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Diisostearyl Malate, Polyethylene, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Silica, Cetyl Dimethicone, Phenoxyethanol, Tin Oxide, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492), Carmine (CI 75470).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use the Cheek-Hugging Highlight Brush 120 (sold separately) to apply onto cheekbones. The brush's asymmetrical shark-tooth shape, you can highlight with more edge and precision.Use the fatter side to supercharge cheeks, the leaner side to low-key luminize your nose and chin, and the precision tip to brighten eyes and your cupid's bow.

reviews.headline: Great Product, will buy again
reviews.comments: Beautiful

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: The shine it gives Me Yes!

reviews.headline: Absolutely Beautiful
reviews.comments: Best highlighter but you need a specific skin tone. The product is great but I would benefit from a different color. Blinding, long lasting, and versatile. Can be used as eyeshadow, to add a shimmer to your lips and obviously highlight.

reviews.headline: My favorite highlighter!
reviews.comments: Since Fenty came on the scene this has always been my go-to highlighter. I always get compliments when I'm wearing it.

reviews.headline: my everyday highlighter
reviews.comments: this has been my go to everyday highlighter for a while, its amazing! the shades go with every look and it lasts all day < 3

reviews.headline: I love it!!
reviews.comments: it's soooooo cute , love everything fenty!

reviews.headline: Perfect glam
reviews.comments: I bought this for my body, looks Beautiful on neck and cold shoulder out fits. The shimmer is perfect!

reviews.headline: GORGEOUS
reviews.comments: So beautiful with such a smooth formula! I like to use this on top of my cheek bones, on my eyes, and a little on my nose! It also lasts a long times! BTW I have the pink one!

reviews.headline: I love this product  second  time
reviews.comments: This  my second  time l buy this love it will again  again.

reviews.headline: Really beautiful on the skin!
reviews.comments: I didn't have tremedous hope for this highlighter combo as I find they can be a bit too glittery for my 54 year old face, HOWEVER, this one has the perfect amount of shimmer to just highlight the areas that you want without looking too shiny.  I also like to pick up both colors with a brush and use the combo as my everyday blush.  If you don't use a setting spray, it will probably wear off fairly quickly, but if you set it, I think the payoff is totally worth it.  I got the Girl Next Door/Chic Phreak color and it worked very well with my fair coloring and blond hair.

reviews.headline: LOVED IT!
reviews.comments: This highlighter is amazing! I absolutely loved it! I went out and had put it all over my face, didn't need any blush. Let me just say my make up that night was on point!

reviews.headline: Did the formula change?
reviews.comments: I repurchased trophy wife but my last one definitely didn't have all this chunky glitter, im so sad.

reviews.headline: I would by this product again
reviews.comments: The colors fit perfectly with all skin tones and very long lasting on the skin

reviews.headline: You but better - understated
reviews.comments: I find that this product blends very well with blush and the natural red tones in my skin. I love mixing both highlighters. It is expensive but worth it!

reviews.headline: absolutely love this
reviews.comments: It was so shimmery and glittery, lasted so long, wore it to prom, and woke up in it lol

reviews.headline: Clown makeup
reviews.comments: I mistakenly picked the pink shimmer shade.. big chucks of glitter. There's no way this can be a highlighter.. maybe for a drag queen or a clown.. idk save your money.

reviews.headline: Color is nice, it looked different in the store.
reviews.comments: I was looking for a certain color, this came close to what I needed. In the store it looked different. I feel that the price for it was a bit high. But i got it because I could find what I was looking for in any other product line.

reviews.headline: I WILL NEVER BE WITHOUT THIS!!
reviews.comments: AMAZING!!!! The bling that this gives off is just breathtaking!! Definitely recommend for all makeup lovers!

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: Love love love this product!

reviews.headline: Worth the money
reviews.comments: Given the price point, this highlighter really does perform well. I got the color girl next-door and it really is worth it, it's so pigmented and doesnt fade.

media.headline: I would by this product again

media.headline: This the the best hightlighter of all time
media.caption: I used it here as a shimmer eyeshadow

faceoff_positive.comments: I didn't have tremedous hope for this highlighter combo as I find they can be a bit too glittery for my 54 year old face, HOWEVER, this one has the perfect amount of shimmer to just highlight the areas that you want without looking too shiny.  I also like to pick up both colors with a brush and use the combo as my everyday blush.  If you don't use a setting spray, it will probably wear off fairly quickly, but if you set it, I think the payoff is totally worth it.  I got the Girl Next Door/Chic Phreak color and it worked very well with my fair coloring and blond hair.
faceoff_positive.headline: Really beautiful on the skin!

faceoff_negative.comments: I like the gold color I mix with another brand but I love it mixed or plan I will love to have a make up this good but a little cheaper so young woman can but the whole kit and not spend over 200 hundred dollars my twin girls broke the bank that day also they wear the clothes too Rihanna we love you products #Fenty life we need coupons or a free gift or concert tickets
faceoff_negative.headline: 2nd best gold life
